channel.title: The Outnumbered Series on Pandaqi Blog
channel.description: Recent content in The Outnumbered Series on Pandaqi Blog

item.title: Nine Lives: Tricksy Kittens
item.description: Welcome to the devlog for Nine Lives: Tricksy Kittens. As expected, it’s a spinoff for Nine Lives. Interestingly, though, this was actually the first seed of the idea.

item.title: Nine Lives
item.description: Welcome to the devlog for the game Nine Lives. The road towards this game is a little weird. It started as a different idea, which I mostly completed before starting work on this one.

item.title: Nine Lives: Math Meows
item.description: Welcome to the devlog (“developer diary”) for my game Nine Lives: Math Meows. This game slipped through the cracks.

item.title: Sixpack
item.description: Welcome to the devlog for my game Sixpack. This started as a short article on my Dutch, personal blog.
